title: 1 word: Try
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\large -1\\leq\\frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2}<7"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"\nHow many integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfy the inequality above?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Case 1","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":": Find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that satisfy "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2}<7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2}<7 \\ \frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2}-7<0 \\ \frac{-13x^2+26x+(a-14)}{2x^2-3x+2}<0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given that, if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ax^2+bx+c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{cases} D \lt 0 & \text{and} & a \lt 0, & ax^2+bx+c & \text{always negative} \\ D \lt 0 & \text{and} & a \gt 0, & ax^2+bx+c & \text{always positive} \end{cases}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Because the denominator has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D<0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a>0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2x^2-3x+2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is always positive. So, value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-13x^2+26x+(a-14)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must be negative ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D<0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":")."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D<0 \\ 26^2-4(-13)(a-14)<0 \\ 676+52a-728<0 \\ a<1"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Case 2","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":": Find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that satisfy "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2} \geq -1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2} \geq -1 \\ \frac{x^2+5x+a}{2x^2-3x+2}+1 \geq 0 \\ \frac{3x^2+2x+(a+2)}{2x^2-3x+2} \geq 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Because the denominator value is always positive, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3x^2+2x+(a+2)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is not negative ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3x^2+2x+(a+2) \geq 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D \leq 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":")."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D \leq 0 \\ 4-4(3)(a+2) \leq 0 \\ 4-12a-24 \leq 0 \\ a \geq -\frac{5}{3}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We get the range is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-\frac{5}{3} \leq a < 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". And integer of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that satisfy the inequalities is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"= \boxed{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" integers."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Sorry for ambiguity. If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a < 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", most of the range is negative ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" -\infty < y \leq \text{maximum value}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), or the turning point are the maximum value of the function. While for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a > 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", most of the range is positive ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{minimum value} \leq y < \infty"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), or the turning point is the minimum value of the function. Because "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a < 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D < 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the function not intercept the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-axis. So, the function is below the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-axis, or the function always negative.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

                                            Is this as such , "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D<0 \implies b^2<4ac \implies b^2<-4c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is negative . "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
But square of any number can't be negative , so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has to be negative. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
But what about "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , it can be negative or positive ?? Please explain. Thank you

title: (1 + x + x^2)^10
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the coefficient of x^7 in (1 + x + x^2)^10,"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We want the coefficient of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" (1 + x + x^2)^{10} \; = \; \left(\frac{1-x^3}{1-x}\right)^{10} \; = \; (1 - x)^{-10} \big(1 - 10x^3 + 45x^6 + \cdots\big) \; =\; \left(\sum_{n=0}^\infty \binom{n+9}{9} x^n\right)\big(1 - 10x^3 + 45x^6 + \cdots ) "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
namely
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \binom{16}{9} - 10\times\binom{13}{9} + 45\times\binom{10}{9} \; = \; \boxed{4740} "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            . We must look of the combination  of the coefficient of  x^7 from  (1)^i . (x)^j . (x^2)^k . where integers, i+j+k = 10
    So we have  (1)^3 . (x)^7 . (x^2)^0 . there are 10C3 .7C7 . 0C0, and 
            (1)^4 . (x)^5 . (x^2)^1 . there are 10C4 6C5 . 1C1, and
            (1)^5 . (x)^3 . (x^2)^2 . there are 10C5 5C3 . 2C2, and
            (1)^6 . (x)^1 . (x^2)^3 . there are 10C6 4C1 . 3C3,     total :  10C3 .7C7 . 0C0 + 10C4 6C5 . 1C1 + 10C5 5C3 . 2C2 + 10C6 4C1 . 3C3 = 4740

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":". We must look of the combination  of the coefficient of  x^7 from  (1)^i . (x)^j . (x^2)^k . where i+j+k = 10
    So we have  (1)^3 . (x)^7 . (x^2)^0 . there are 10C3 .7C7 . 0C0, and 
            (1)^4 . (x)^5 . (x^2)^1 . there are 10C4 6C5 . 1C1, and 
            (1)^5 . (x)^3 . (x^2)^2 . there are 10C5 5C3 . 2C2,and 
            (1)^6 . (x)^1 . (x^2)^3 . there are 10C6 4C1 . 3C3,     total :  10C3 .7C7 . 0C0 + 10C4 6C5 . 1C1 + 10C5 5C3 . 2C2+10C6 4C1 . 3C3 = 4740"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is an expansion of a trinomial "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{p=0}^3 \frac{10!}{(6-p)! (2 p+1)! (3-p)!} \Rightarrow 4740"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum _{p=0}^3 \left(\left(\frac{10}{6-p,\,2 p+1,\,3-p}\right)\right) \Rightarrow 4740"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The terms in the denominator, from left to right, respectively are the powers of the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" terms. Note that the combined powers of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is 7."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
